definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Some places tea tea as a kind of enjoyment of the arts to promote.
sentences.chinese: 有的地方把饮茶品茗作为一种艺术享受来推广。

sentences.english: A retired civil servant. He likes Chinese calligraphy, painting appreciation and the art of tea.
sentences.chinese: 退休公务员，喜爱欣赏书画及品茗等艺术。

sentences.english: Don't forget to savor the last smell in the bottom of the cup after tasting tea.
sentences.chinese: 品茗之后，不要忘了享受一下杯底的余香。

sentences.english: Tea is not a good habit.
sentences.chinese: 吃茶品茗没有是个好风俗。

sentences.english: I suppose tea is more popular in China.
sentences.chinese: 我想中国人更喜好品茗。

sentences.english: what would you like to drink after dinner, coffee or tea?
sentences.chinese: 晚餐后您想喝咖啡还是品茗？

sentences.english: The whole world has more than 100 countries and area residents are fond of tea.
sentences.chinese: 全世界有一百多个国家和地区的居民都喜爱品茗。
我喜好品茗不喜欢喝咖啡。

definition: to have tea and refreshments/to have dimsum lunch (Cantonese)
to talk endlessly/talking of anything under the sun
to talk of the past and discuss the present (idiom)/to chat freely/to discuss everything
